#  Contact the Mayor and City Council 

  [Print]()  [Feedback]()   [Font Size:]()  [+]()  [-]()  

***

## Privacy Policy

 __For questions about whether the information you submit is private,__ please [read the City of Hillsboro Privacy Policy](https://www.hillsboro-oregon.gov/our-city/website-privacy-policy).

***

  __Please fill out the following form to send a message to the Mayor, the full City Council, or select individual Council Members. You will have the option to select your recipients below.__  * Full Name First Name Last Name The Full Name field is a required field and cannot be left blank. Full Address (Optional) Street Number and Name Unit Number City Postal/ZIP Code * Email The Email field is a required field and cannot be left blank. Confirm email address * Phone Phone The Phone field is a required field and cannot be left blank. Preferred Contact Method Please reply by email address Please reply by phone I do not wish to be contacted 

## Learn More

 [Visit our Hillsboro 101 webpage](https://www.hillsboro-oregon.gov/?navid=3773) to review the roles and responsibilities of the Mayor and City Council, and learn more about our Council-Manager form of government.

To find out what ward you reside in, type your address into our [Hillsboro Maps tool](https://www.hillsboro-oregon.gov/?navid=426).

 Who would you like to contact? Hillsboro Mayor Beach Pace Entire Hillsboro City Council (includes Mayor Pace) Selected City Councilor(s) 

If you would like to send an attachment, please email the document to __Council@Hillsboro-Oregon.gov__.

 * Your Question or Comment: 2000 characters The Your Question or Comment: field is a required field and cannot be left blank.
